snippet: Foreign Minister Ali Akbar Salehi said Monday that Iran was prepared to resolve the nuclear dispute with world powers at their next meeting, if the West eased the sanctions imposed on Iran.
abstract: Iranian Foreign Min Ali Akbar Salehi says Iran is prepared to resolve the nuclear dispute with world powers at their next meeting if the West eases sanctions imposed on it.
lead_paragraph: Foreign Minister Ali Akbar Salehi said Monday that Iran was prepared to resolve the nuclear dispute with world powers at their next meeting, if the West eased the sanctions imposed on Iran.

headline.main: Iran: Ready to Resolve Dispute, and Eager to Ease Sanctions
headline.print_headline: Iran: Official Expresses Interest In Resolving Nuclear Dispute
